patthana16.45:1.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.45:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.45:2.1_0: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
